name: MergeContactIntercom
description:
Merge a lead contact into a user contact in Intercom.

Use this tool to merge a contact with a role of 'lead' into another contact with a role of 'user' on the Intercom platform. This is useful for unifying contact information and maintaining a clean contact database.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use for the merge operation. Choose from available versions like '1.0', '1.1', etc.

parameters.name: lead_contact_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the contact to merge away from. It must be a lead.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the contact to merge away from. Must be a lead.

parameters.name: merge_into_user_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the contact to merge into. Must be a user contact ID.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the contact to merge into. Must be a user.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the contact to merge away from. Must be a lead.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the contact to merge away from. Must be a lead.

parameters.name: into
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the contact to merge into. Must be a user.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the contact to merge into. Must be a user.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
